metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1552 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
[Unknown description]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1552` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hhvm - 3.12.11+dfsg-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hhvm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.12.11+dfsg-1build1').
